favourite.article: How sweet is the kisses of our LORD... we feel the freshness of life...thank You. LORD JESUS, I Love You...
Oh Lord may I always live You and respond to You.

What a blessed new hymn! Few there be who know this intimate walk with the One Most Beautiful, Jesus. He keeps calling me back to Him daily. I surfed onto this wonderful site looking for lyrics to another hymn. Gracias, Ricardo de Bolivia, por traducirlo tambien!!!

What a deep and rich song this is. Who is the author??? Christ for sure. This is the experience we as children of God should pray for daily. Life as it is, full of so much adversity. This love will exclude all but His divine love.

There is absolutely nothing better than the kisses of our Lord Jesus. From His kisses flows the fountains of living waters that refresh, and renew my being. Definetly there is no anxiety when I am tempered by His kisses. No fear, only life divine!

What a lovely hymn!! I want intensely what this hymn says!! I want His kisses!! I want to turn to His love, left my enjoyments and let Him kiss me more!! Lord Jesus, my Jesus! I love You!!
I couldn't resist! Here is the translation without metric:
Con los besos de Tu boca
1. Con los besos de Tu boca, Me has besado, Señor. De Tus besos fluye una fuente, De profundidad desconocida. Tirnamente atemperada por Tu toque En mis más profundas cuerdas, Mi corazón es renovado con regocijo, Y mi amor desborda.
2. Déjame besarte, beberte profundamente, Me satisface completamente Todas las ansias profundas en mi, Por Tu presencia cercana, Y una profunda, dulce unión, De Tu vida con la mia Que nuestras naturalezas completamente mezcladas, Puedan nuestros corazones entrelazar.
3. Siempre incrementándote, Señor, en mi interior, Mi deseo es para Ti. Que tus besos siempre me besen, Y que yo Te bese. Querido Señor Jesus, que pueda siempre estar, Tan comprometido contigo. Que Te ame, siempre que te ame, Y que responda a Ti. Que Te ame, siempre que te ame, Y que responda a Ti.
